title: Engagement Prediction and Enhancement Strategies for Gifted Learners Through Arduino-Based Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming and digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Arduino-based language learning projects analyzing learners' emotional/social traits and learning patterns in limited real-time interaction environments, aiming to establish data-driven personalized strategies

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% task completion rates while practicing language learning content through Arduino projects
Learners establish self-directed learning strategies using emotion-tracking tools and record over 75% improvement in engagement rates
Learners can create personalized learning plans based on machine learning-based analytical reports
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
